title: When you see the enemy picked all-for-one Ahri

replies.body: you're getting this up vote for that gif, and no other reason

We meet again, **Fish**.
https://49.media.tumblr.com/352a61604876adcc225743e092e53e48/tumblr_mwwe64rX5t1rg0lgoo1_500.gif

So, uh... How do you like this music?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QGQ-7c3bdT0
wot
Cause... His name is "burnt light". The same with he music's.
He is the master of all memes and all his gifs are turned holy.
Nah.
Or {{champion:420}}
https://media.giphy.com/media/a5viI92PAF89q/giphy.gif

How fitting! I just played All For One as Ahri _versus_ Illaoi. They were "charmed, I'm sure". xD
_Yep, we won._
i got to play taric vs illoi, players actually DC'd when we got into a late game 5v5 becuase all 10 plaeyrs ulted at once.

"DC'ed" - yeah, right. xD

I played another game against the other part of that gemful duo: Ezreal. My team played as Syndra.
The Ez's made a lot of jokes against the ladies early game, but we were told not to let Taric know about it...

Funny thing was, after team Ez gave first blood (must've been painful - unless he's used to it...), they got very quiet.
I'm sure it wouldn't be the first time, but for some reason, they seemingly didn't want to play with out balls.

>Top tip: the Syndra balls can be interacted with by other Syndras.

And once we got to the late game, it was a case of "the ez is real".

So it was another win for us. But we were nice, so none said "gg ez" at game end.

Have you had to play a game when there were 25 tentacles in play at once, with 10 diffrent instances of taric ults going off at once, on top of 10 diffrent taric stuns?  There were so many effects on screen at once we didnt even know who had won the fight until the power-point presentation on screen ended.

Well who won?

My first guess would be illaoi because a lot of those tentacles would hit before the invul and remain afterwards.

We did, becuase by 45 in we timed our ults and our heals perfectly so for a solid 20 seconds we were all unkillable, at the exact moment they ulted.  After which we jsut stunlocked them and beat them into a pulp.
Ah ok, I didn't get that at first because you said "all of us ulted at once" that didn't sound liek perfect timing (;
literally no one can die

So you were using Charm on them? Uh?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAp9BKosZXs

Yeah...not sure if _they_ liked it though. xD

But if you'd called Illaoi "a girl" to her face, she'd probably tentacle-slap you. Then again, just to check if you were in balance.
I was thinking {{champion:76}}  but illaoi's snusnu is better

Are we the enemy?

http://i.imgur.com/s2Blpgz.png
Did you dodge everytime you didn't get ahri or 5 man premade?

I am sorry  i didnt get it.
You get to fight 5 hot foxy ladies, but it means that you might die to them in game as well.

~~might~~
will be buried under an avalanche of hyper mobile love

Honestly, my idea of heaven is me playing Teemo against 5 Tristanas.

Pretty much nosebleed material if Teemos weren't banned.

Disabled for normal people, but he's available at customs  

i wish i played teemo in ofa at least once
OFA Teemo is the stuff of PTSD nightmares. You're too afraid to go anywhere without stepping on their shrooms.

I don't want to upvote you because your threads are trash attention-whoring nonsense using stolen gifs, but I love Futurama just too much not to.

You win this round.
http://i108.photobucket.com/albums/n21/INF01/Smilies/speechless.gif
SNOO SNOO

What about all for one Kindred...
https://media1.giphy.com/media/r75ImMRYtSpYQ/200.gif

Actually its kinda weird cause you can't get stacks off jungle marks for some reason even if you look and see if its yours. That and trying to keep track of who you mark is a pain so it doesn't conflict with someone else.

Plus, keeping one yasuo alive for 15 seconds while his buddies are coming in turns out to be a pretty bad idea.

Me as that matched progressed: "UGH, THIS IS GONNA BE PAI- ... oh wait no it's not! >:D"

Must be really awkward when you ace that team

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
5 ahris.... http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/stop_penis_erect_archer-gap.jpg
I actually just did a AFO where we were ALL Ahri. Both teams. Want to talk about the charm fest. Ahri won. {{champion:103}}
Pretty sure the PLAYERS won that one.
